title: Pair Loop Earrings
description:
Pair gold earrings. Loop a single heavy solid gold wire, the ends fastening in a heavy cylinder coil with serrated ends. From base depends single heavy loop with opening on side.
Condition: Good. Wear on inner base of small loop suggests there was originally some pendant attached to it.

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
